title: Contact ICP Filters
description: Faceted multi-value filtering on the Contacts page. 8 filter dimensions (industry, company_size, geo_region, revenue_range, seniority_level, department, job_titles, linkedin_activity), each with include/exclude toggle. Faceted count endpoint (`POST /api/contacts/filter-counts`), job title typeahead (`GET /api/contacts/job-titles`). Frontend: `MultiSelectFilter`, `JobTitleFilter`, `useAdvancedFilters` hook with URL serialization. Spec: `docs/specs/contact-icp-filters/`.
